name: AN_HGM_RECORD_INFO
description: This table stores the Scripting template (HGM) record information such as the type and context of each record.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the Scripting Template.

columns.name: RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Scripting Template.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Scripting Template.
